title: Arya (a single, double & triple typeface) 70% OFF!
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**"Arya"** by Vicente Lamónaca](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415075521/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/arya/?refby=tipotype), with a release offer of 70% OFF!!!
